Name: English Rose
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon juice & sugar rim. (optional), maraschino cherry &/or edible rose petal.
Review: A dry, complex, gin-laced cocktail. Stir well, and depending on your ice, consider adding 7.5ml (¼oz) of well-chilled water before stirring.
Nutrition: One serving of English Rose contains 169 calories
